channel.title: Lost-Realm 718 Release
channel.description:
Some of the updates [CODE] Farming, Both Falador & Catherby allotments & Ardougne 90% Ish Lodestones (Don't have the small cutscene yet) Prestige System Summoning Completionist Cape Requirements Skiller Cape Requirements Trivia Game via World message Lost-City Quest Bones on altar Every skill trainable/working Squeal Of Fortune Abyss Tree Farming @ Falador Park Shooting Stars Bonecrusher + Demon horn necklace Toolbelts (Started) Excavating statue for secret training location lol A Start on Construction, Have loading objects in Preview mode, and Building of objects in Build Mode. In-Game Highscores In-Game Drop Log Added Dwarf Cannon & Royal Cannon Fixed Corporal Beast Safe Spotting + Sea Troll Queen safe spotting. Fixed some small bugs such as Magic bow special attack and crystal bow attack (Crystal Bows GFX was at the players feet) Added Money Pouch, works in trade, shops and picking up from floor.
There's more but I've forgotten[/CODE]
[CENTER]Made a start on Toolbelts, Fairly easy, just time consuming to add everything to work when having items in toolbelt.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iwn2x81.png[/img] [IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/4650/8335cdb9534a4a9a9fc49f3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/2742/adaba45cf208404181b44fb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QQ5vf75.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wD6DsQ1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/7323/d14dd50524be4195b70664c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/42/db43747aaa0741ec91b6d7c.png[/img] [IMG]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/8063/36451b9376404c6bb69a013.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/3428/0a35a0be6eb54caeaa96437.png[/img] [IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/5048/97b29f4a2df14f13bca2b9d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/b0EPGM0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/7315/e1a980be9d3c4d6d9a78d27.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/s0udhB5.png[/img] [IMG]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/3082/f70c570852de409092a6a6d.png[/img] [IMG]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/5017/0dadbf31238742c0ac4c9f7.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
Cache download - [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!ed1GyLqJ!QRFGAC4RkSiH9ceV47UK2Dl_Rykw5dWbgKmtddlE-d8]https://mega.co.nz/#!ed1GyLqJ!QRFGAC4RkSiH9ceV47UK2Dl_Rykw5dWbgKmtddlE-d8[/url] Once you have downloaded that extract the cache from data>cache to your desktop.
Client Download - http://www.mediafire.com/?39329305qzk2xtz
Source Download - http://uppit.com/s95lh0xgk80c/Lost-Realm_718.rar
Then place the cache from your desktop into the cache folder in the lost-realm source which is located at data>cache
P.S - I am Santa Hat from Rune - Server
Credits: Matrix Team Myself

item.title: Lost-Realm 718 Release
item.dc:creator: @Pkmasterpwnz Pkmasterpwnz
item.description:
@Pkmasterpwnz wrote:

Alright, so I have seen that a lot of people are wanting the source… and people keep uploading the sources for the servers to these file-sharing websites. I have the source for this server, and will upload it to a real website and not one of these crappy file-share sites, because they keep getting taken down. The site I will be uploading this source on will not be a file-share and will just be a direct-link.

NOTE: I HAVE DONE A CONSIDERABLE AMOUNT OF EDITING OF THIS SOURCE TO MY LIKING, BUT THE CHANGES AREN’T THAT DRASTIC.
I will be uploading the link today… at around 4:30-5:00.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @junkfroggy junkfroggy

[table]
[tr]
[td][/td]
[/tr]
[/table][quote author=junkfroggy link=topic=645148.msg4417393#msg4417393 date=1396567057]
Anyone know how to make users donor rank?

This isnt the server help section…and mess around with the rights till you get it. Or this may not even have donor ranks
[/quote]

I would appreciate if you would not respond without knowing this source.
[/quote]

Lol, I do just don’t remember. And says you? You don’t even know how to find out how to change the rights…[/quote]

Actually, I do.
I’ve already started converted the source for my own needs.

I would rather recycle a feature before adding it, though. It’s called using your brain and not being an asshat.
